question: Dr Nirmal Hirawat, the former Madhya Pradesh minister has passed away. She was associated with which political party?
explanation: Dr Nirmal Hirawat (74), the former Madhya Pradesh minister and senior Congress leader, has passed away at Katangi town in Balaghat District on May 9, 2018. The Congress leader, who was well-known as a doctor among the local residents, was instrumental in getting the status of a tehsil for Katangi. He was a member of former Chief Minister Shyama Charan Shukla\'s cabinet.
